title: Leaver Buster
body: I was in game and all three of my friends who live in the same town got dc'd and then we all could not log in, this resulted in me getting a 20 min leaver buster. Does this happen to a lot of people? Rito pls remove this <3

replies.body: Happened to me while i was addicted to League during a heavy storm. My wifi cut out for about 1 hour.

Disconnecting from a single game will not land you in a low-priority queue, and in fact, it takes a trend of disconnections before you'll see a penalty. Because disconnections negatively affect everyone in the match, regardless of reason, they're all treated equally by the server. This is also a factor as to why penalties cannot be removed or modified.

If you experience any other issues with disconnecting from the servers, please let me know and we can troubleshoot the cause.
That is understandable, and i will for sure, how many more games before I get low-priority again? or is there a set number?

There's no set number. The system acts against players with a trend of disconnections since we totally understand that sometimes **stuff goes wrong** or an emergency pops up.

I hope that clears this up. If you want a full run-down on Leaverbuster, check out [our FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) on it.
